pullrequest.title: Limit the size of the transport buffers

content.raw:
ran `vrc_task_2.launch` with `laser_assembler.launch` and `pub_atlas_command_fast`.  Memory footprint snapshots with `top`:

~~~
18814 ubuntu    20   0 9372m 1.8g  76m R  320  5.6   6:54.56 gzserver -s libgazebo_ros_api_plugin.so vrc_task_2.world -q -r --record_encoding=zlib --record_path=/tmp/vrc_task_2 __name:=gazebo __log:=/home/ubuntu/.ros/log/2b21d0c6-ce78-11e
18814 ubuntu    20   0 10.4g 2.9g  76m S  319  9.3   8:15.79 gzserver -s libgazebo_ros_api_plugin.so vrc_task_2.world -q -r --record_encoding=zlib --record_path=/tmp/vrc_task_2 __name:=gazebo __log:=/home/ubuntu/.ros/log/2b21d0c6-ce78-11e
~~~

will try `valgrind` next.
